meanings.definition: A small seabird of the auk family, typically found in cold northern waters.
meanings.sent1: The dovekies nested on the rocky cliffs near the icy ocean.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of dovekies diving gracefully into the frigid sea.
meanings.sent3: The dovekies decided to have a race to see who could swim the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts soared like a flock of dovekies, diving into the depths of her imagination.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the dovekies soaring above the waves was a breathtaking moment.

meanings.definition: The act of diving or plunging into water.
meanings.sent1: The dovekies into the pool was a perfect ten.
meanings.sent2: With a splash, the dovekies into the lake was refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The synchronized dovekies competition at the pool was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to take a risk was like a daring dovekies into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The dovekies off the diving board was met with cheers from the crowd.
